1.title: Heavy Metal Model A

episode of.title: Speed Is the New Black (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: A rock star client calls on Noah to give a Ford Model A some heavy metal attitude. This old school ride gets some new school hot rod edge as the team works to turn this into rock and roll on wheels.

2.title: All American Pick Up

episode of.title: Speed Is the New Black (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Classic Car Studios gives a 1953 Chevy truck a top to bottom custom restyling to make a couple's road trip dream car. Also, an old client returns with some loud demands.

3.title: Hockey Mad Nomad

episode of.title: Speed Is the New Black (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: A family mad for hockey tasks Noah and team to transform their '57 Nomad into a powerful family ride equally ready for everyday activities and high- performance track days. And a father and son restyle their 1967 Mustang to match their 2017 Mustang GT350

4.title: Blazing Fast F-100

episode of.title: Speed Is the New Black (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: When a military veteran and retiring firefighter pitches Noah on his dream race truck, the shop rallies around the build and turns this 70's pickup into an autocross bomb.

5.title: Hot Rod Power Tour

episode of.title: Speed Is the New Black (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Noah and his crew decide to transform their clunker of a shop truck into a piece of rolling art, making it worthy of participating in the Hot Rod Power Tour. A pilot longs to get his aviation inspired Bel Air ready for take-off.

6.title: Cadillac Time Machine

episode of.title: Speed Is the New Black (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: A new client longs for her high school glory days and tasks Classic Car Studio with restoring her 1965 Cadillac El Dorado to its original 60's style while adding much needed modern technology.

7.title: Mean Mash-Up

episode of.title: Speed Is the New Black (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: More than 40 years since totaling a 1971 Chevelle a new client is ready to rebuild his first dream car. Starting from a bare frame, the crew begins the process of giving this Chevelle a new life, one that will turn heads at shows, and on the road.

8.title: Mini Car, Mega Power

episode of.title: Speed Is the New Black (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: A lover of small cars and fast speeds has Noah and the team rebuild her 1970 Mini so she can race her boyfriend and enjoy zippy rides on country drives. A massive horsepower upgrade makes this Mini one huge beast.

9.title: Chevelle Reborn - Part 1

episode of.title: Speed Is the New Black (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: More than 40 years since totaling a 1971 Chevelle a new client is ready to rebuild his first dream car. Starting from a bare frame, the crew begins the process of giving this Chevelle a new life, one that will turn heads at shows, and on the road.

10.title: Chevelle Reborn - Part 2

episode of.title: Speed Is the New Black (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: With new demands from their client, Classic Car Studios fights to finish their 1971 Chevelle reinvention from classic muscle to modern day super car. A new look, Ferrari inspired custom touches & a new power plant make this a true, one of a kind Chevelle

1.title: A Mustang's Twists and Turns

episode of.title: Speed Is the New Black (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: A running and restored 1962 Corvette gets chopped and dropped as Noah and team set out to retain all the natural beauty of this car while amplifying its performance specs to compete with modern day racers.

2.title: 9-1-1 on a 911

episode of.title: Speed Is the New Black (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Noah has a new client who wants to take a 1953 Ford F-100 from a farmland hauler to an ass-hauling racer! What starts as a rust bucket truck on its last legs gets an epic overhaul that pushes his guys to the limit to get it done to Noah's high standards.

3.title: Who's the Boss?

episode of.title: Speed Is the New Black (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Noah has his hands full modifying a 1957 Chevy Bel Air for a married couple with two separate visions. And a mystery client that they've never met has high demands for turning a '69 Camaro into a luxury ride.

4.title: A Triumph-ant Homecoming

episode of.title: Speed Is the New Black (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Noah's excited to stretch his wings and take on a Triumph TR3, but his guys don't share the same love for this British racer. But they all get a taste of serious American adrenaline when Noah pushes for some hot upgrades to their shop truck.

5.title: Corvetter's Gonna Hate

episode of.title: Speed Is the New Black (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: A running and restored 1962 Corvette is chopped and dropped as Noah and team set out to retain the natural beauty of the vehicle while amplifying its performance specs to compete with modern racers.

6.title: Wild Horses

episode of.title: Speed Is the New Black (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Perhaps the only shop where 1000 horsepower isn't enough is at Classic Car Studio. Noah challenges his team to take a 1969 Chevelle and turn it into a fierce speed demon that will win as many car shows as it will attract speeding tickets.

7.title: The Pickup with Pickup

episode of.title: Speed Is the New Black (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: Noah has a new client who wants to take a 1953 Ford F-100 from a farmland hauler to an ass-hauling racer! What starts as a rust bucket truck on its last legs gets an epic overhaul that pushes his guys to the limit to get it done to Noah's high standards.

8.title: If It Ain't Steel, It Ain't Real

episode of.title: Speed Is the New Black (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Noah finally turns his lead fabricator, Scott, lose on a 1962 Chrysler 300 after months of reigning him in on other cars. The result is a completely custom aviation-themed hot rod that looks like anything but Grandpa's old grocery getter.

imdb.title: Speed Is the New Black
akas: Speed Is the New Black (United States)
plot: Noah Alexander and his team build and restore cars at Classic Car Studio in St. Louis, Missouri.::McTeague
